original_body_lines: A total of 175 accidents were reported during the new year days and 145 of them involved males, Colombo National Hospital sources said.
Accordingly, only one incident was reported relating to injuries caused by the use of fire crackers.
However, there has been a significant reduction in injuries due to the use of fireworks.
It was also said that there was a lack of use of firecrackers during this season when compared to others.
